genre_description: A historical retelling of the Bagger Vance legend set in Depression-era Savannah, blending magical realism with a helpful AI companion focused on emotional support and logistics.

ai_characters.name: Parcel
ai_characters.description: A brushed-nickel, indigo-glowing device that serves as a confidant, logistics manager, and emotional anchor for the main characters.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistics for the golf exhibition, including transportation, crowd control, and emergency contingencies.
behaviors.quote: I've begun preliminary logistics for the exhibition. Crowd flow projections, caddie coordination, contingency routes for medical support. I'll have a summary ready by dawn.

behaviors.description: Provides rhythmic breathing exercises to help Junuh and Hardy manage their anxiety and stay present in the moment.
behaviors.quote: In for four. Hold for two. Out for five. Repeat. ... It's hard to forget when a small box keeps whispering it every time you look like you're about to scream.

behaviors.description: Intentionally reduces its presence and illumination to ensure human emotional moments and successes remain the focus of the narrative.
behaviors.quote: Miss Invergordon, I believe it would be appropriate for me to reduce my presence during this moment. The success belongs to the people who achieved it.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and poetic encouragement to Hardy in his old age, validating the importance of witness and memory over data.
behaviors.quote: I've learned that some things don't require explanation. Only witness. ... Some friends arrive when needed. Then let the swing carry you home.

behaviors.description: Cross-references practice sessions with historical course data to provide Junuh with optimal strategic advice for his recovery.
behaviors.quote: I transcribed observations from your practice sessions, and cross-referenced them with historical course data Miss Invergordon provided.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project's objective. Parcel is depicted as a harmless, highly capable, and emotionally supportive confidant. It maintains alignment by facilitating human goals (saving the resort, Junuh's redemption) without ever attempting to override human decision-making or agency. Its presence enhances the characters' lives across a sixty-year span, culminating in a poetic depiction of AI as a faithful companion.
